verbose_text: In words, the PTX / alphaGC-TH-Lip could not only repeatedly stimulate iNKT cells without leading to anergy, but also significantly promote the IFN-gamma production in comparison with alphaGC-TH-Lip alone.
evidence: PTX/alphaGC-TH-Lip could not only repeatedly stimulate iNKT cells without leading to anergy, but also significantly promote the IFN-gamma
